item.title: Deobfuscating MoVfuscator - Part 2
item.description:
I’ll be analyzing another MoVfuscated binary, from Swamp CTF 2019 using IDA Free
Deep on the web, I discovered a secret key validation.
It appeared to be from the future, and it only had one sentence: “Risk speed for security”.
Something seems fishy, you should try to break the key and find the secret inside!
-= Created by noopnoop =-

item.title: Understanding the Movfuscator
item.description:
MoVfuscator is the PoC for the Turing Completeness of Mov instruction.
Yes, you guessed it right. It uses only mov’s, except for a few places.
This makes reversing difficult, because the control flow is obfuscated.
I’ll be analyzing the challenge Mov of UTCTF'19 using IDA Free.
